function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible cross contamination during the purification or RNA isolation step","Impact":"Misinterpretation of test results, leading to false positive SARS-CoV-2 signals","Mitigation":"Implementation of additional controls and monitoring of the isolation process","Technologies":"Improved purification and isolation techniques","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management, researchers"},{"Description":"Unspecific signal in RT-qPCR due to environmental contaminants","Impact":"Inaccurate detection of SARS-CoV-2 leading to false positive or false negative results","Mitigation":"Improving purification methods, controlling environmental contaminants, and using specific control samples","Technologies":"Enhanced purification techniques, environmental monitoring technology","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management, researchers"},{"Description":"Potential false-positive results due to environmental contaminants affecting PCR","Impact":"Misinterpretation of test results, leading to false positive SARS-CoV-2 signals","Mitigation":"Careful monitoring of pH, salt concentration, and contamination with extraneous nucleic acids during PCR process","Technologies":"Advanced pH and contamination monitoring technology","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management, researchers"}]}
